created_by: E.M. Anhaus (originally from Atomic Blue Detections, Endgame), oscd.community
name: Audio Capture via SoundRecorder
description: Detect attacker collecting audio via SoundRecorder application.
false_positives: Legitimate audio capture by legitimate user.
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(process.executable:*\\SoundRecorder.exe AND process.command_line:*\/FILE*)`
